feed.title: SAP Community - SAP ERP
feed.subtitle: SAP ERP Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: which is the difference between country key and reporting country?
entry.content: How should I use these two fields? Is it correct in case of fiscal representative to use country key for the parent company's country and the reporting country for indicating the country in which the invoice will be considered for tax purposes?

entry.title: How use the Basic Configuration to enable Edoc_cockpit transaction
entry.content:
Hello Community Team,

Please could you help me to understand better how I can reuse the EDOC_COCKPIT transaction for another country without DRC. So far, I know the following

-Enable with the basic configuration for the specific country (This is only manual configuration, for example, enable through SPRO.. Country Code, Document Type,...?)

-Create a program for outgoing message

-Create a program for incoming message

But I do not sure, If I have take into account another important point to implement this possibility. 

Could you please help me understand a little more about what else would need to be done using the basic SAP COCKPIT? I have reviewed many SAP notes, but the information I have found only applies to licensed DRC.

Question:
Is it necessary to implement any notes in addition to performing the basic manual configuration for the country? or should I take the support package into account?

This is to use in ERP.Thank you in advance for your help.

#eDocument #electronic invoicing  #edocument solution

entry.title: Transaktion ME22N Felder bei Positionstyp D nicht änderbar, keine Folgebelege vorhanden
entry.content:
Bei einer Bestellung  mit dem Positionstyp Dienstleistung ist es nicht möglich mit der Transaktion ME22N z.B. die Rahmenvertragsnummer oder Rahmenvertragsposition zu ändern.  Folgebelege sind nicht vorhanden.  Die Felder sind in der Bildsteuerung auf "Kann" eingestellt. Bei Normalbestellungen ist eine Änderung möglich. Wir löschen jetzt immer die Position und legen diese mit der richtigen Kontraktposition neu an. Gibt es eine andere Lösung?

Vielen Dank!

entry.title: Smartforms barcode with barcode content embedded as in Adobe Forms
entry.content:
Hey experts,

anyone knows if in smartforms there is also an option to create a barcode with the barcode content embedded in the barcode itself, same as in Adobe Forms: ?

I know that i can put a separate text line under barcode in smartforms to have the text in readable letters but having it embedded in the barcode as in Adobe forms is more elegant. Any chance in Smartforms as well ?

Thanks and BR

Manuel

entry.title: Not getting GTS SPL screening block for the business partners
entry.content: We are not getting GTS SPL screening block for the business partners, which are in the SPL list from Dow jones because of the C/O field value in BP address, which is coming from ECC to GTS.

entry.title: report for CSK1 in ECC6
entry.content:
Hello Team,

we are looking for a report for CSK1 in ECC6. in CSK1, it allow us enter one SO item to get its BOM. Is there any report in SAP ECC6 allow us enter multiple SO items to extract their BOM list?

entry.title: IDOC_INPUT_ORDERS Date type : Dates are not converted into the date type defined in customazing
entry.content:
FM :IDOC_INPUT_ORDERS  & Date type :

Dates from segment E1EDK03 idoc type ORDERS  are not converted into the date type defined in SPRO  "Define item proposal types" (V_TVAK-KPRGBZ).

 

Then error occurs during treatment cause the date format are in days and not in the default date type defined in customazing.

entry.title: Error en aplicación Nota 3613078
entry.content:
Hola buen día,

Nosotros hemos aplicado la opcion 3, se realizo paso a paso la sugerencia de SAP:

se configura la tabla T51P6

 

Copia del subesquema MXIN a ZMXI con los ajustes sugerido agregando la funció PRDNT en la linea 100:

 

 

Adicional en el esquema principal, se reemplaza MXIN a ZMXI que fue el primer esquema copiado y modificado:

 

 

 

Se crearon las reglas y se agregaron al esquema:

 

 

 

 

Cambiar el esquema MXDD para utilizar ZXPD en lugar de XPDD:

 

Se modifico la clase de tratamiento del /381.

 

Sin embargo, al calcular no genera los conceptos /381, /383 /385 en la tabla ARRRS y genera el /561:

entry.title: SPER Message in STO without EWM
entry.content:
Dear SAP Experts, 

I want to configure the SPER message to delete automatically the inbound delivery, I followed the steps indicated in the blog bellow, 

https://community.sap.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-blog-posts-by-members/output-type-sper-delete-inbound-delivery-after-we-reverse-pgi-for-sto/bc-p/14189844#M71916

But I have the error message when I add the SPER Message to the outbound delivery

(Inbound delivery 0180004394 is not EWM relevant or not distributed to EWM : Message No. /SPE/STO_HANDLING005)

Do I need to have EWM activated to use the SPER message  ?

Thank you,

entry.title: MR11 Issue
entry.content:
Hi SAP Team ,

 

We need you help  for the MR11 issue.

1. GR was posted with shipment cost creation with DCGR
2. Inbound shipment cost was created

3. GR/Return (122) was posted and DCGR reversal and difference .95 Usd
In consequence, we have difference value for planned delivery costs:

Further , I checked stock but no stock available in SAP so not possible to return/reverse the  GR again and do the correct posting.
Same issue for the rest PO . Please find the update from our side.

 

Please let us know how we can clear the differences.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

PO- 4500891783

 

GR-1 KG, MIRO-1 KG Credit memo – 1 kg

Return - .990, Scrape --.010

 

 

 

Regards

Prashanth

entry.title: Query on using Virtual Hostnames in Windows servers
entry.content:
Hi Team,

 

We are building new SAP systems on Windows[using virtual hostnames] to migrate current landscape which is also on Windows but uses physical hostname.

 

We are retaining old physical hostname as virtual hostname in new builds

 

As per note DIGITS, we have disabled DNS registry and used skipassource option for SAP system installations. Our network team has below questions for firewall and NSG settings to be adopted.

  1. changes done as part of note DIGITS are permanent? because DNS registry needs enabling for virtual hostname after cutover
  2. Is note DIGITS applicable for builds on Azure Cloud.
  3. Which IP is used as source for outbound connections as skipassource parameter is set and all outbound data goes through this IP. Share available article/note for the same 
  4. As per DIGITS IP and hostname should resolve to each other. If we set skipassource, for outbound SAP application data will it work as OS IP will be used to send out data
  5. In a distributed system though ASCS/ERS are using cluster IP and load balancer, for application servers we intend to use virtual hostnames, is this supported and points of DIGITS can be used.

 

We had a detailed discussion with our network team and checked all SAP Notes DIGITS,DIGITS,DIGITS and installation guide 

 

NW7XX_inst_abap_win_sql.pdf, but the answers are not clear.

 

Kindly, answer above questions for us to proceed further with builds and take required precautions.

 

regards

 

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Depreciation showing successfull in AS02, but did not post!
entry.content:
Depreciation showing successfull in AS02, but did not post!

We did 2 changes on 2 assets which led to a newcalculation of the dep.run. When I wanted to run the depr. run, the changed assets were not within the run.

Now the changed assets have the mark "successfull depr. run", but they have not been depreciated (there is no accounting document!).

As we have to do Year-End-Close today, we have to have a sollution asap :-)....

Thanks and br,

entry.title: Payment block on down payment not automatically removed even after linked with Vendor Invoice
entry.content: Payment block "A" is not removed automatically on the down payment even after the Vendor invoice has been linked.

entry.title: SAP NOTE FOR CREATE XML TRANSFORMATION LOGBR_NF_TO_XML_DOWNLOAD
entry.content:
We're trying to implement the Brazilian tax reform notes in SAP ecc 6 ehp8. I can't find the SAP note responsible for creating the XML transformation LOGBR_NF_TO_XML_DOWNLOAD, which is used in some post-implementation notes.
Does anyone know which SAP note creates this transformation?
Thank you!

Cesar Cardoso.

entry.title: Anlagenliste zu Lieferplaneinteilungen (PDF) in ME39 fehlt
entry.content:
Hallo Experten,

Die Anlagenliste für Lieferabrufe (Lieferplaneinteilungen), die auch an den Lieferanten als pdf geschickt wird fehlt  in ME39, wird stattdessen aber in ME33L angezeigt.  Dafür fehlt in ME33L wiederum die Anlage zum Lieferplandruck.

Richtig wäre: Anlage zum Druck des Lieferplans in ME33L und Anlagen zum Druck Lieferplaneinteilungen in ME39.

Hinweis 1: Dieses Verhalten ist im S4 HANA Testsystem.  Im aktuellen ERP System funktioniert es richtig.

Hinweis 2: Verwendet wird BUS2013 in Tabelle TOAOM und TOA01, Ist das richtig?

Was könnte noch fehlen? Wer könnte mal bei sich im System nachsehen,  wie die TOAOM und T681Z für MEOSCHEDUL aussehen muss?

entry.title: Multiple entries in VEKP for the same EXIDV in EWM decentralized scenario
entry.content:
We create and manage Handling Units (HUs) in our production plant , which is HU managed. We then transfer these HUs to the distribution center, which is EWM (decentralized) managed, using a Stock Transport Order (STO). Subsequently, we send the HU back to the production plant for any reason.

Upon checking the VEKP, we notice that this process results in three records for the same EXIDV, which  creates issues for us.

Could you please let me know if this is a standard behavior and if someone has experiences the same behavior?

 

Thanks

 

Claudio

entry.title: I am looking for way to run MD51 project planning in the background.
entry.content:
There are no run in background function in this tcode. MDBT only support plant level planning.

There are requirement to run WBS with MRP control parameters different from plant.

SAP ERP #MD51 #Project_planning #background_job #production_lot

entry.title: Change sales order item to individual stock after maintaining delivery priority
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

we want all sales order items with a specific delivery priority to run in the sales order individual stock. Do you know of a way I can implement this? My idea would be to change the item categroy after the delivery priority has been maintained by the employee. But I'm not sure which UserExit is the right one for this. Can you help me?


Thanks and best regards

entry.title: IN SAP ,Number of Packages 15 and Shell Roll Line Item Delivery Quantity 16 are not same.
FINT and value date for outstanding receivables
entry.content:
Hello SAP-Friends,

is there any way that FINT is able to take the value date of the EBST-posting into account during calculation of the outstanding days of receivables. I know we can set up tolerance-days and transfer-days and calendars in the FINT-customizing, but it is not really the same thing. My business desires to have the calucation of interest days not between due date and clearing date, but between the due date and the value date (VALUT) of the posting of the EBST (electronic bank statement). 

Did you hear a requirement like this before?
Thanks for your suggestions, thoughts, opinions.

KR
Christina

ps: My business sees that the SEPA-realtimetransfers as a risk, that we get more differences between value date and clearing date.
